document.heading: Compulsory/No Fault Motor Vehicle Insurance Amendment Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-186, the “Compulsory/No Fault Motor Vehicle Insurance Amendment Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-194. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 5, 2012, and July 10, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 6, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-439 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-186 became effective on Oct. 23, 2012.
